questions.question: I .......................... to go many days ago.
questions.description: We use the simple past tense with past time expressions like ago.

questions.question: Only ............................... people attended the meeting.
questions.description: We use 'a few' to mean 'some'. Few means almost none.

questions.question: I was late but ........................... were on time.
questions.description: Either 'others' or 'other people' is possible here.

questions.question: I asked his opinion ............................... not to offend him.
Maria, ......................... is on holiday at the moment, is my neighbor.
questions.description: We cannot use 'that' in non-identifying relative clauses.

questions.question: I worked ........................... long.
questions.description: We do not use articles in the expression 'all day'.

questions.question: They ................................ the station before I arrived.
questions.description: We do not use prepositions after reach.

questions.question: I had an enjoyable day ........................ I was one of the winners.
questions.description: Because is a conjunction. Because of is a preposition.

questions.question: ........................... children like chocolates.
questions.description: No article is used before most when we generalize things.

questions.question: I visited them ...........................
questions.description: No article or preposition are used before expressions like next week, last month, next day etc.

questions.question: I don't know ......................... I will be able to come.
questions.description: We can use if or whether to introduce indirect questions.

questions.question: It is time she .................................. to bed.
questions.description: We use past tenses after 'it's time' with present or future reference.
